query.message: searching synonyms of bioentities that have locations

bag-type.query: SELECT DISTINCT a2_.id as a5_, a1_.value as a6_ FROM org.flymine.model.genomic.Synonym AS a1_, org.flymine.model.genomic.BioEntity AS a2_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Relation AS a3_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Chromosome AS a4_ WHERE (LOWER(a1_.value) in ? AND a1_.subject CONTAINS a2_ AND a2_.objects CONTAINS a3_ AND a3_.object CONTAINS a4_ AND a1_.isPrimary = true and LOWER(a1_.value) like 'fbgn%')

query.message: searching synonyms of bioentities that have locations

bag-type.query: SELECT DISTINCT a2_.id as a5_, a1_.value as a6_ FROM org.flymine.model.genomic.Synonym AS a1_, org.flymine.model.genomic.BioEntity AS a2_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Relation AS a3_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Chromosome AS a4_ WHERE (LOWER(a1_.value) in ? AND a1_.subject CONTAINS a2_ AND a2_.objects CONTAINS a3_ AND a3_.object CONTAINS a4_ AND a1_.isPrimary = false and LOWER(a1_.value) like 'fbgn%')

query.message: searching key fields for all types

bag-type.query: SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.value as a4_ FROM org.flymine.model.genomic.BioEntity AS a1_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Synonym AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.synonyms CONTAINS a2_ AND a2_.isPrimary = true and lower(a2_.value) in ?)

SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.value as a4_ FROM org.flymine.model.genomic.BioEntity AS a1_, org.flymine.model.genomic.Synonym AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.synonyms CONTAINS a2_ AND a2_.isPrimary = false and lower(a2_.value) in ?)
